column1: #Text=Chow says : " Your father sent us a letter years ago with your names , but that was the last we heard from him .
#Text=You do n't know what it 's like on the streets .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , Mako and I grew up on the streets .
#Text=We were homeless , then we were kinda in a gang , then we lived in a gym ... " Chow says : " Hey everybody !
#Text=Look who 's here , San 's kids : Mako and Bolin .
#Text=" Male family member says : " No way .
#Text=" Female family member says : " Come in .
#Text=" Chow says : " Boys , this is your grandmother , Yin .
#Text=" Yin says : " Aw , it is so wonderful to meet my long lost grandchildren Where is San and your mother ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait , you mean you do n't know ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sorry , they were killed when we were little .
